region.label: Region
region.tooltip: Regions in multifunctional enzymes or fusion proteins, or characteristics of a region, e.g., protein-protein interactions mediation

coiled.label: Coiled coil
coiled.tooltip: Coiled coils are built by two or more alpha-helices that wind around each other to form a supercoil

motif.label: Motif
motif.tooltip: Short conserved sequence motif of biological significance

repeat.label: Repeat
repeat.tooltip: Repeated sequence motifs or repeated domains within the protein

ca_bind.label: Calcium binding
ca_bind.tooltip: Calcium-binding regions, such as the EF-hand motif

dna_bind.label: DNA binding
dna_bind.tooltip: DNA-binding domains such as AP2/ERF domain, the ETS domain, the Fork-Head domain, the HMG box and the Myb domain

domain.label: Domain
domain.tooltip: Specific combination of secondary structures organized into a characteristic three-dimensional structure or fold

zn_fing.label: Zinc finger
zn_fing.tooltip: Small, functional, independently folded domain that coordinates one or more zinc ions

np_bind.label: Nucleotide binding
np_bind.tooltip: (aka flavin-binding). Region in the protein which binds nucleotide phosphates

metal.label: Metal binding
metal.tooltip: Binding site for a metal ion

site.label: Site
site.tooltip: Any interesting single amino acid site on the sequence

binding.label: Binding site
binding.tooltip: Binding site for any chemical group (co-enzyme, prosthetic group, etc.)

act_site.label: Active site
act_site.tooltip: Amino acid(s) directly involved in the activity of an enzyme

chain.label: Chain
chain.tooltip: (aka mature region). This describes the extent of a polypeptide chain in the mature protein following processing

transit.label: Transit peptide
transit.tooltip: This describes the extent of a transit peptide

init_met.label: Initiator methionine
init_met.tooltip: This indicates that the initiator methionine is cleaved from the mature protein

propep.label: Propeptide
propep.tooltip: Part of a protein that is cleaved during maturation or activation

peptide.label: Peptide
peptide.tooltip: The position and length of an active peptide in the mature protein

disulfid.label: Disulfide bond
disulfid.tooltip: The positions of cysteine residues participating in disulphide bonds

crosslnk.label: Cross-link
crosslnk.tooltip: Covalent linkages of various types formed between two proteins or between two parts of the same protein

mod_res.label: Modified residue
mod_res.tooltip: Modified residues such as phosphorylation, acetylation, acylation, methylation

compbias.label: Compositional bias
compbias.tooltip: Position of regions of compositional bias within the protein and the particular amino acids that are over-represented within those regions

non_cons.label: Non-adjacent residues
non_cons.tooltip: Indicates that two residues in a sequence are not consecutive and that there is an undetermined number of unsequenced residues between them

non_ter.label: Non-terminal residue
non_ter.tooltip: The sequence is incomplete. The residue is not the terminal residue of the complete protein

unsure.label: Sequence uncertainty
unsure.tooltip: Regions of a sequence for which the authors are unsure about the sequence assignment

helix.label: Helix
helix.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined helical regions

strand.label: Beta strand
strand.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined beta strands

turn.label: Turn
turn.tooltip: The positions of experimentally determined hydrogen-bonded turns

topo_dom.label: Topological domain
topo_dom.tooltip: Location of non-membrane regions of membrane-spanning proteins

intramem.label: Intramembrane
intramem.tooltip: Extent of a region located in a membrane without crossing it

mutagen.label: Mutagenesis
mutagen.tooltip: Site which has been experimentally altered by mutagenesis

variant.label: Natural variant
variant.tooltip: Natural variant of the protein, including polymorphisms, variations between strains, isolates or cultivars, disease-associated mutations and RNA editing events
